sys_remote_update_set.description: The Code Search tool built into the Application Studio is very handy, but aren't you tired of having to go into the Studio just to use the code search? This app will help out by breaking out the functionality into a Service Portal page and widget, which can be called by a URL.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Code Search for SP

sys_update_xml.name: sys_trigger_1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_trigger"><sys_trigger action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><application/><calendar/><claimed_by/><document/><document_key/><error_count>0</error_count><job_context/><job_id display_value="RunScriptJob">81c92ce9c0a8016400e5f0d2f784ea78</job_id><last_error/><log>false</log><maintenance>false</maintenance><max_drift/><name>Share Install Logger</name><next_action>2014-01-01 23:29:16</next_action><parent/><priority>100</priority><processing_duration>0</processing_duration><repeat/><run_count>0</run_count><run_dayofmonth/><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_month>1</run_month><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_weekinmonth>1</run_weekinmonth><script>var logClient = new GlideSimpleHTTPClient('https://share.servicenow.com/installLogger.do');
var query_string = 'installed_by=' + gs.getUserName() + '&instance_name=' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '&artifact=bdd408c4138b7a000de935528144b040&content=e39cb6ef13b67a000de935528144b058';
gs.log('posting to: ' + query_string);
logClient.get(query_string);</script><state>0</state><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_scope display_value="Code Search for SP">59ca65d30f32320087b165ba32050e30</sys_scope><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><system_id/><trigger_class>DEFAULT</trigger_class><trigger_type>0</trigger_type></sys_trigger></record_update>
